name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, specializing in **Java**, **Java EE**, **SQL**, and **JavaScript** for delivering high-performance software solutions. Proficient in developing dynamic web applications using **React**, **Vue.js**, **Angular**, and **HTML/CSS**, with a robust understanding of Object-Oriented Programming principles. Adept at implementing both **REST** and **SOAP** APIs, ensuring seamless data flow and integration.
Focused on best practices in UX and Quality Assurance to produce user-centric applications, while driving technical documentation and adhering to version control standards. Proven problem-solving skills, coupled with a passion for collaboration and mentoring within cross-functional teams.
Previously led full-stack development efforts leveraging **Node.js**, **Flutter**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, with substantial cloud expertise in **Azure** and **AWS**. Demonstrated experience in microservices architecture, building enterprise-grade platforms that meet compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS while incorporating Machine Learning capabilities into production environments.

Developed and maintained scalable software solutions utilizing **Java** (version **8**), **Java EE**, and **REST**ful web services, ensuring high-quality performance for enterprise-grade applications.
Implemented Object-Oriented Programming principles and design patterns, enhancing code reusability and maintainability that led to a decrease in bug reports by **20%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver reliable user interfaces by applying **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and **SQL** for seamless data integration and user interaction.
